name: Analyze Writing
description: Perform comprehensive writing analysis on document content. Analyzes readability (Flesch, Gunning Fog, SMOG), tone & sentiment, grammar & style issues, vocabulary richness, and sentence structure. Returns detailed metrics and suggestions for improvement. Can analyze the full document or just selected text.

moduleId.description: ID of the DocumentEditor component to analyze (must match existing module ID from render_manifest). If omitted, analyzes the provided content instead.

content.description: Text content to analyze. Use this if not analyzing a mounted DocumentEditor component.

analysisType.description: Type of analysis to perform. 'full' runs all analyzers, or specify one: 'readability', 'tone', 'grammar', 'style', 'vocabulary', 'sentences'

targetAudience.description: Target audience for the writing. Adjusts recommendations accordingly.

targetReadingLevel.description: Target reading grade level (1-16+). Recommendations will aim for this level.

selection.description: Analyze only selected text range (if omitted, analyzes entire document)

autoFix.description: Automatically apply fixes for certain issue types

returnFormat.description: Format of analysis results. 'detailed' includes all metrics and issues, 'summary' provides overview, 'scores_only' returns just numeric scores
